myriad 0.9.1.9000

Package index

Import fonts

import Myriad fonts for use in plots

copy_myriad_fonts()
Copy Myriad Pro and Socviz fonts from ~/Library/Fonts to the myriad package
import_myriad()
Import all Myriad Pro font faces and styles for use in graphs as "Myriad Pro".
import_myriad_semi()
Import Myriad SemiCondensed only
import_myriad_condensed()
Import Myriad Condensed only
import_socviz_semi()
Import Socviz Semicondensed
import_socviz_condensed()
Import Socviz Condensed

Theme functions

Basic, map, and NY map themse

theme_myriad_semi()
theme_myriad_semi
theme_myriad_map()
theme_myriad_map
theme_myriad_nymap()
Myriad New York City map theme
theme_socviz_semi()
theme_socviz_semi
theme_socviz_map()
theme_socviz_map
theme_socviz_nymap()
Socviz New York City map theme
